faqs.question: What time do you stream?
faqs.answer: I stream Monday-Friday at 7pm EST on YouTube! See you there üéÆ Catch replays on the channel if you miss it!

faqs.question: How can I support you?
faqs.answer: Thanks for asking! You can support through YouTube memberships, Patreon, or just sharing my content. Every bit helps! üôè The real support though? Your engagement and feedback!

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with you?
faqs.answer: Collaboration opportunities, I love! ü§ù DM me your idea with details. Tech content creators especially welcome. Review all serious proposals, I do.

faqs.question: How long does it take you to respond to DMs?
faqs.answer: I try to respond within 24-48 hours! Sometimes faster if I'm online. Thanks for your patience üôå

faqs.question: What's your tech stack?
faqs.answer: Currently building with Swift/SwiftUI for iOS, Firebase backend, and OpenAI for AI features. Love working with modern, clean architectures!

faqs.question: How do I get early access to your projects?
faqs.answer: Join the community! Members get early access to beta builds, behind-the-scenes content, and input on what I build next. Link in bio! üöÄ

faqs.question: Can you help me debug my code?
faqs.answer: For quick questions, ask in the community chat! For 1-on-1 help, I offer paid consulting sessions. DM me for details!

faqs.question: Where can I find your content?
faqs.answer: YouTube for tutorials and streams, Twitter for quick tips, and GitHub for code. All links in my bio! Subscribe to stay updated üì±

faqs.question: Do you take tutorial requests?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Drop your request in the community or DM me. Can't promise I'll do every one, but I read them all and pick based on what helps the most people üí°

faqs.question: Are you hiring or looking for contributors?
faqs.answer: Not actively hiring right now, but always open to collaborations! If you're working on something cool in the Swift/iOS space, let's chat!

faqs.question: What's the best way to learn iOS development?
faqs.answer: Start with Apple's Swift Playgrounds, then build a simple app. My beginner series on YouTube covers the fundamentals. Most importantly: build stuff! üõ†Ô∏è

faqs.question: Can I use your code in my project?
faqs.answer: If it's open source on my GitHub, yes! Just check the license (usually MIT). Attribution appreciated but not required. Build cool stuff! üéâ

faqs.question: Do you offer sponsorships?
faqs.answer: For product sponsorships, DM me with details about your tool/service and what you're looking for. Tech tools that help developers are my jam! ü§ù

faqs.question: What timezone are you in?
faqs.answer: I'm in EST (Eastern Standard Time). Stream times and response times are based on that. Currently that's UTC-5! ‚è∞

faqs.question: Can I be a guest on your stream?
faqs.answer: Love having guests! If you're building something interesting or have expertise to share, DM me with what you'd like to talk about. Let's make it happen! üéôÔ∏è
